alert.note: Alert for Belmont; Carroll; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 12:34AM EDT until June 14 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Harrison County in east central Ohio... Southwestern Jefferson County in east central Ohio... Northern Guernsey County in east central Ohio... Southern Carroll County in east central Ohio... Western Belmont County in east central Ohio... Eastern Tuscarawas County in east central Ohio... * Until 115 AM EDT. * At 1233 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near East Sparta to near Uhrichsville to near Cambridge, moving east at 60 mph. THESE ARE DESTRUCTIVE STORMS! HAZARD...80 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Extensive tree damage and widespread power outages. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged. Expect considerable damage to roofs, windows and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... New Philadelphia, Dover, Uhrichsville, St. Clairsville, Barnesville, Cadiz, Freeport, Dennison, Gnadenhutten, Bethesda, Antrim, and Tuscarawas. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...80 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across portions of east-central Ohio. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.

area.areaDesc: Belmont; Carroll; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas
